Related repos

  • tools for finetuning language models with instruction datasets and preference optimization
  • local coding agent for running, editing, and generating code in your terminal using natural language prompts
  • AI agent for software development tasks
  • open-source CLI AI assistant for shell commands, runs locally
  • chat-based open-source assistant that can run language models and connect with other apps

  • Web interface for Claude Code agents
